title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Natural
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Natural 
Mineral Waters, Spring Waters and Other Waters in Bottles or Containers) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

(2) The Principal Regulations and these Regulations may be cited together 
as the European Union (Natural Mineral Waters, Spring Waters and Other 
Waters in Bottles or Containers) Regulations 2016 and 2020.

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the European
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the European 
Union (Natural Mineral Waters, Spring Waters and Other Waters in Bottles or 
Containers) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 282 of 2016).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean european union (natural mineral water spring water water bottle containers) regulation 2016 (s.i no 282 2016)

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: 3. Regulation 17 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting
text_raw:
3. Regulation 17 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting 

for paragraph (11) the following paragraph: 

“(11) (a) The Authority shall define the sampling frequencies for 
radioactive substances in other waters having regard to the volume of 
water produced, as appropriate. 

(b) The Authority, or an official agency, shall monitor for radioactive 
substances in other waters in accordance with the sampling frequencies 
defined by the Authority pursuant to subparagraph (a), in order to check 
whether the values of radioactive substances comply with the 
parametric values referred to in Regulation 16(1)(c) and (d).”. 

1 OJ No. L 296, 7.11.2013, p. 12. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd March, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [55] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

26 February, 2020. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [55]

title: on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

give 

These Regulations 
to Council Directive 
2013/51/EURATOM of 22 October 2013, in particular by requiring the Food 
Safety Authority of Ireland to define the sampling frequencies for other waters 
which apply in monitoring of such waters for radioactive substances. 

further 

effect 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Natural Mineral Waters, Spring 
Waters and Other Waters in Bottles or Containers) Regulations 2016. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Natural Mineral 
Waters, Spring Waters and Other Waters 
in Bottles or Containers) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [55] 5
